spec_data.Name: pyroom
spec_data.Description:
PyRoom is full-screen text editor, without buttons, menu, formatting,
so you can  focus on writing, and only writing. It is written in
Python + GTK. It is also a clone of Writeroom.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:18:38 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: PyRoom is a full screen text editor and a clone of Writeroom
